RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: summon kirin
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Kirin appeared on the map! You feel that another kirin will not appear on the map for another 3 weeks.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: summon feenix
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Feenix appeared on the map! You feel that another feenix will not appear on the map for another 3 weeks.
